attributes.action: Get the Wakefield council to build a  stadium & swimming pool the locals of the City Of Wakefield deserve
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The city of wakefield has got one run down stadium which needs to be replaced so the super league rugby team (Wakefield Wildcats) wont be removed from the league in 2011.

Also wakefield council demolished the city swimming pool (Sun Lane) in 2005 saying it will be rebuilt, so far nothing has been done & a car park is now in place of the original swimming pool.

The council has been "making plans" for a long time now and nothing has come out of the waterworks, the citizens of wakefield believe the council are doing nothing to help them!

The locals are upset about the situation and want new facilities to buy built soon.

We want the facilities for us and our children.

What we are asking for is the prime minister to tell the council to get the sporting facilities we are asking for built.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Get the Wakefield council to build a stadium & swimming pool the locals of the City Of Wakefield deserve."
